offer_summary.job_title: Freelance Senior RoR Developer with JS
offer_summary.location: remote work - Bulgaria відкритий для українців
offer_summary.job_description: We are looking for a Senior RoR Developer with JS and experience with email technologies like Mailgun or SparkPost. Your responsibilities will include working on various projects from different industries such as fintech, healthcare, insurance, or education.
requirements: At least 5 years' experience and advanced knowledge of Ruby and Ruby on Rails development
Solid basics of JavaScript (experience with Ember.js would be beneficial)
Experience with email technologies like Mailgun or SparkPost
benefits: dev-friendly processes, like Continuous Integration and Code Review
work with a team of experts and continuous development of your hard and soft skills
